recipes.title: Spicy Arrabiata Penne
recipes.overview: Spicy Arrabiata Penne is a flavorful pasta dish that features penne pasta coated in a spicy tomato sauce. The word 'Arrabiata' comes from the Italian word for 'angry' or 'enraged,' referring to the heat from the chili peppers in the sauce. This dish is celebrated for its simplicity and robust flavor profile, making it a favorite among fans of spicy Italian cuisine.
instructions: Boil penne pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Sauté minced garlic in olive oil until fragrant. Add chili flakes or chopped fresh chilies, and cook briefly.
Incorporate canned tomatoes or tomato sauce, simmering until the sauce thickens. Season with salt and pepper.
Toss the cooked penne pasta with the spicy tomato sauce, ensuring it is well coated.
Finish with fresh parsley for a burst of color and freshness. Optionally, add a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.overview: Beef Wellington is a classic British dish featuring a tender beef fillet coated with mushroom duxelles and wrapped in puff pastry. It’s an elegant dish perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Season the beef tenderloin with salt and pepper.
Sear the beef in a hot pan with butter until browned on all sides. Set aside to cool.
Chop mushrooms and cook with garlic and thyme until the mixture is dry. Let it cool.
Wrap the beef with the mushroom mixture, then prosciutto.
Roll out puff pastry and wrap it around the beef. Seal the edges.
Brush with egg yolk and bake at 200°C (400°F) for 25-30 minutes or until the pastry is golden and the beef is cooked to your liking.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.overview: Chicken Alfredo is a rich and creamy pasta dish featuring tender chicken pieces in a luscious Alfredo sauce. It's a comforting meal perfect for a hearty dinner.
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper. Cook in a skillet with butter until fully cooked. Remove and slice into strips.
In the same skillet, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and chicken to the sauce. Toss to coat evenly.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajita
recipes.overview: Chicken Fajita is a popular Mexican dish consisting of marinated chicken strips cooked with bell peppers and onions. It’s typically served with warm tortillas, salsa, and other toppings for a flavorful and customizable meal.
instructions: In a bowl, combine olive oil, fajita seasoning, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Add the sliced chicken breast to the marinade, ensuring it's well coated. Marinate for at least 15 minutes.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the marinated chicken until fully cooked, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the sliced bell peppers and onions to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture with warm tortillas. Garnish with lime wedges and fresh cilantro.
